text: Watford tube station is a station at the end of the Watford branch of London Underground's Metropolitan line in the north-western part of the network in Zone 7, previously zone A. There are plans to close this station when a new line to Watford Junction railway station opens, called the Croxley Rail Link, by 2020. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Hertfordshire Category:Metropolitan line stations Category:Watford Category:1925 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in England
title: Watford tube station
